title: Hextech renting lost
body: When Hextech renting i lost my Hextech annie and i would like it back if u could give it back thanks. I was Really sad to see that my Hextech Annie was lost when 7 days went by and I didn't see My Skin back. I would love to see it back and thanks if u could bring back my hextech annie. And To show you guys i have proof of me having the skin.

replies.body:
It seems that you already answered your own question, but I wanted to jump in and clarify: If you rent any piece of content from Hextech, it consumes the shard.  Therefore if you used the shard for renting it, there is no way to get the shard back unless you earn it once again from either opening chests, or from rerolling shards.

I wish I had better news >.<  Let me know if you have any other questions!
i didn't know that when you rent a skin you don't get it back
